name: lmdb-store
author: Kris Zyp
description: Simple, efficient, scalable data store wrapper for LMDB

scripts.prebuild: prebuildify --target 17.0.1 && prebuildify --target 16.13.0 && prebuildify --target 15.5.0 && prebuildify --target 14.17.6 && prebuildify --target 12.17.0 && prebuildify --target electron@15.2.0
scripts.prebuild-musl: prebuildify --target 17.0.1 --libc musl --tag-libc && prebuildify --target 16.13.0 --libc musl --tag-libc && prebuildify --target 14.17.6 --libc musl --tag-libc && prebuildify --target 12.22.7 --libc musl --tag-libc
scripts.prebuild-arm64: prebuildify --arch=arm64 --target 17.0.1 --libc musl && prebuildify --arch=arm64 --target 16.13.0 && prebuildify --arch=arm64 --target 14.17.6 && prebuildify --arch=arm64 --target electron@15.2.0
scripts.before-publish: prebuildify-ci download && prebuildify --target 17.1.0 && prebuildify --target 16.13.0 && prebuildify --target 15.5.0 && prebuildify --target 14.17.6 && prebuildify --target 12.17.0 && prebuildify --target electron@15.2.0
scripts.recompile: node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build -d
